# external-workspaces agent-instructions

Get the instructions for an external agent

## Usage

```console
coder external-workspaces agent-instructions [flags] [user/]workspace[.agent]
```

## Options

### -o, --output

|         |                         |
|---------|-------------------------|
| Type    | <code>text\|json</code> |
| Default | <code>text</code>       |

Output format.
